CONTROLLER_STOP_ADDRESS
[CONTROLLER]

class  INSTLIB::CONTROL_STOP_ADDRESS

Functions

INT32 INSTLIB::CONTROL_STOP_ADDRESS::Activate (CONTROL_HANDLER ch, VOID *val, BOOL passContext)

Detailed Description

Controller for detecting the end of an interval using an address or symbol and a count Use -stop_address [address|address:count|symbol|symbol:count|address:count]

Function Documentation

VOID *  val,
BOOL  passContext
)  [inline, inherited]
 

Activate the controller if the -stop_address knob is provided

Returns:
1 if controller can start an interval, otherwise 0
